location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter to William Hornby, President and Governor, Council at Bombay, from John Beaumont and George Green at Bushire

physicalDescription.extent: The item is damaged with sections of paper missing, but the text remains complete and is unaffected.

mods.abstract: Short letter that gives the principal sum taken up at interest on account of the company and states that since the Bussora [Basra] council is providing news of developments concerning Bussora and the Gulph [Gulf], it is not necessary for the news to be duplicated.
